name: Bicycle Kick
description: A kick where a player jumps into the air and kicks the ball backward over their head.

name: Chip
description: A short, lofted pass or shot executed by a quick and light kicking motion.

name: Corner Kick
description: A method of restarting play in a game of football.

name: Curl
description: A kick that puts a spin on the ball, causing it to curve in the air.

name: Dribbling
description: The skill of controlling the ball while running.

name: Free Kick
description: A kick awarded to a team following a foul or other infringement by the opposition.

name: Header
description: The technique of hitting the ball with your head.

name: Keepie Uppie
description: A skill where a player tries to keep the ball in the air as long as possible.

name: Long Pass
description: A long-range pass to a teammate.

name: Nutmeg
description: A technique where a player plays the ball through an opponent's legs.

name: Penalty Kick
description: A type of direct free kick taken from the penalty mark.

name: Rainbow Kick
description: A trick where the ball is flicked up and over the player's head and the opponent.

name: Shooting
description: The act of kicking the ball towards the goal in an attempt to score.

name: Tackle
description: A skill used to take the ball away from an opponent.
